text: The 2019 Malaysia Cup group stage featured 16 teams and will start on 2 August. A total of 16 teams will compete in the group stage to decide the 8 places in the knockout stage of the 2019 Malaysia Cup. ==Draw== The draw for the group stage was held on 23 July 2019, 12:00 MYT (UTC+8), at the Damansara Performing Arts Centre in Petaling Jaya, Selangor. The 16 teams were drawn into 4 groups. In the group stage, each group was played on a home-and-away round-robin basis. The winners and runners-up of each group advanced to the knockout stage. ==Schedule== The schedule of each matchday is as follows. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Matchday !Dates |- |Matchday 1 |colspan=2|2–4 August 2019 |- |Matchday 2 |colspan=2|7–8 August 2019 |- |Matchday 3 |colspan=2|16–18 August 2019 |- |Matchday 4 |colspan=2|20–25 August 2019 |- |Matchday 5 |colspan=2|13–14 September 2019 |- |Matchday 6 |colspan=2|18–22 September 2019 |- |} ==Group== ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group C=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group D=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==References== Category:2019 in Malaysian football Category:Piala Malaysia seasons
title: 2019 Malaysia Cup group stage
